sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include">
    <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <access>package_private</access>
        <active>true</active>
        <api_name>sn_vsc.VSCGetScanResultsDateTimeUtil</api_name>
        <caller_access/>
        <client_callable>false</client_callable>
        <description/>
        <name>VSCGetScanResultsDateTimeUtil</name>
        <script><![CDATA[var VSCGetScanResultsDateTimeUtil = Class.create();
VSCGetScanResultsDateTimeUtil.prototype = {
    initialize: function() {},

	/*
 	* Function to get scan results created on time from date as input
 	* @params: input date selected from date picker component
 	* @return: list of created_on time in result array 
 	*
 	*/
    getResultsTimeFromDateSelection: function(inputDate, inputSuite) {
        var results = [];
        if (!inputDate) {
            return results;
        }

        var scanStart = "start";
        var scanEnd = "end";
        var date = inputDate;

        var gr_suite = new GlideRecord('scan_suite_execution');
		gr_suite.addQuery('suite.sys_id', inputSuite);
        var query = "sys_created_onON" + date + "@javascript:gs.dateGenerate('" + date + "','" + scanStart + "')@javascript:gs.dateGenerate('" + date + "','" + scanEnd + "')";
        gr_suite.addEncodedQuery(query);
        gr_suite.query();
        while (gr_suite.next()) {
            var resultId = gr_suite.sys_id.toString();
            var label = gr_suite.sys_created_on.getDisplayValue().toString();
            var timeLabel = label.split(" ")[1];
            results.push({
                "label": timeLabel,
                "id": resultId
            });
        }

        results.sort(function(a, b) {
            a = a.label.toUpperCase();
            b = b.label.toUpperCase();
            return (a > b) ? -1 : (a < b) ? 1 : 0;
        });

        return results;
    },

    type: 'VSCGetScanResultsDateTimeUtil'
};]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2022-06-17 23:49:30</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>928cc15f874c111061ee083f37cb0b46</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>VSCGetScanResultsDateTimeUtil</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="Security Center" source="sn_vsc">a51d46e3f2014110366b10017c5ba675</sys_package>
        <sys_policy/>
        <sys_scope display_value="Security Center">a51d46e3f2014110366b10017c5ba675</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_include_928cc15f874c111061ee083f37cb0b46</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2022-09-01 23:41:33</sys_updated_on>
    </sys_script_include>
</record_update>
